AI Description: BUSCO (Benchmarking Universal Single-Copy Orthologs) is a software package that assesses genome assembly, gene set, and transcriptome completeness based on evolutionarily informed expectations of gene content.
Core Features: 1. Evaluation of genome assembly and gene or protein set completeness. 2. Benchmarking against evolutionarily-informed expectations. 3. Analysis of orthologous genes or proteins. 4. Scalable and versatile for different organisms.
